Julia 1.0:
  image: julia:1.0
  script: julia --project=@. -e '
    using Pkg
    Pkg.build()
    Pkg.test(coverage=true)'
  coverage: /Test Coverage (\d+\.\d+%)/
  after_script:
    - julia -e '
        using Pkg
        Pkg.add("Coverage")
        using Coverage
        c, t = get_summary(process_folder())
        using Printf
        @printf "Test Coverage %.2f%%\n" 100c/t'
